: : Kup : :
As soon as it went dark Kup moved, expecting an attack. He was right. Energy weapons shot at his former position.
The light from the shots allowed Kup to see Flicker run. Kup followed after.
Kup decided to take a calculated risk. He shot his plasma rifle low, sending shots at Flicker's feet. He shot low so not to hurt Nightlight.
Kup: I hope your ready to die, lad!
 cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:OOC: Hey gimme a break, I'm only on once a day ...

Flicker::

The spy marks his enemies' locations carefully.  He pulls Nightlight 
around so she's between him and Kup - the Autobot will have to shoot 
through her to get him.  Then the hack device kicks in.  It opens 
every door and hatchway in the base, then causes the power grid to 
overload itself and blow out, plunging the base into darkness.  All 
with Rodimus's access codes.

Flicker takes that as his cue.  His night-vision sensors already in 
place, he suddenly shifts his aim and fires several blasts at 
Condor.  He whips around and fires a couple times at Kup as well, 
then dashes for the nearest exit, his hostage slung over his shoulder.
